entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of freezing rain mixed with snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of freezing rain beginning in the evening. Freezing rain or periods of snow in the evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
